channel.title: Kanpur on Anand Chowdhary
channel.description: Recent content in Kanpur on Anand Chowdhary

item.title: eSummit
item.description: At IIT Kanpur’s flagship entrepreneurship event, eSummit 2018, I was invited to speak about my journey, lessons, and upcoming opportunities in technology. I was part of the Forbes 30 Under 30 session which featured entrepreneurs from this year’s list sharing their experiences before a Q&A session.
